hero.title: Software & Web Developer | Data Analyst
hero.intro: Crafting efficient solutions with 3 years in software development and 10 years in business analytics

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I am a passionate software developer with 4 years of experience building modern web applications and data-driven solutions.
about.p2: With 10 years of background in business and finance, I bring a unique perspective to software development.
about.p3: Currently based in Rosenheim, Germany, I work with cutting-edge technologies.
